typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		article as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		UnitID as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> vfconfortPrepared
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		article as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		month as string,
		year as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mabillePrepared
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string,
		agence_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> orcabPrepared
source(output(
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_file as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		canal as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tereva
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		sous_famille as string,
		reference as string,
		agence_code as string,
		departement_id as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSC
source(output(
		distributeur as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> maillard
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		year as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Partedis
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		{Nom Agence} as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Référence Article} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		{Description Article} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EHS
select1, mabillePrepared union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1, sOrcab union(byName: true)~> Union2
tereva select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		HubSAPid,
		County,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sTereva
distributeurDSC select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		sous_famille,
		reference,
		agence_code,
		departement_id,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sDSC
maillard select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		reference,
		article,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		{Code postal},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		marque_file,
		agence_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sMaillard
distributeurOrcab select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference,
		article,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		distributeur,
		agence_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sOrcab
Union2, sTereva union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union3, sDSC union(byName: true)~> Union4
Union4, sMaillard union(byName: true)~> Union5
UnionEHS select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file,
		ca_ecoulement,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		agence_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
orcabPrepared derive(distributeur = "orcab") ~> distributeurOrcab
distributeurPartedis select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		{Code postal},
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sPartedis
Partedis derive(distributeur = "partedis") ~> distributeurPartedis
Union5, sPartedis union(byName: true)~> unionPartedis
DSC derive(distributeur = "DSC") ~> distributeurDSC
unionPartedis, sEHS union(byName: true)~> UnionEHS
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sEHS
EHS derive(marque_id = coalesce(iif (  instr(lower({marque_file}) , "saunier") >0  , "1604" , "1621" )   )) ~> derivedColumn1
vfconfortPrepared select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		article,
		ca_ecoulement,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		agence_code = {Code point de vente}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
dropColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['allDistruUnioned.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> allDistruUnioned
